message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents value at the beginning of the period from the given cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, there is a section titled "Cash and Cash Equivalents" which contains three line items:
1. Beginning Balance: 8000000.00
2. Ending Balance: 477081.24
3. Net Increase: -7522918.76

The "Beginning Balance" line item specifically represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period. According to the statement, this value is 8000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
